name: idearalph
description: Generate and validate startup ideas using Ralph Wiggum's accidentally genius methodology. Iterates until ideas score 9.9/10 on PMF dimensions, then generates comprehensive PRDs.
author: Vibeship

ralph-loop.description: Generate startup ideas with iterative refinement until 9.9+ score

arguments.name: prompt
arguments.description: The domain or initial idea to explore

arguments.name: --completion-promise
arguments.description: Text to output when complete (default: SCORE_ACHIEVED)

ralph-prd.description: Generate a PRD for a validated idea

arguments.name: idea
arguments.description: The idea to create a PRD for

arguments.name: --level
arguments.description: PRD detail level: napkin, science-fair, or genius
